text: Ralph Willard Terry (January 9, 1936 - March 16, 2022) was an American right- handed starting pitcher. She played twelve seasons in Major League Baseball (MLB). He played for the New York Yankees, Kansas City Athletics, Cleveland Indians, and New York Mets from 1956 to 1967. Terry was born in Big Cabin, Oklahoma. On December 31, 2021 Terry was hospitalized after hitting his head after falling in Larned, Kansas. He died almost three months later on March 16, 2022 at the age of 86. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Accidental deaths from falls in the United States Category:Deaths from head injury Category:New York Yankees players Category:Kansas City Athletics players Category:Cleveland Indians players Category:New York Mets players Category:Sportspeople from Oklahoma
title: Ralph Terry
